Flying from Kathmandu-Phaplu (35minutes).Then a short downhill walk of 20min to Salleri 
from Phaplu airstrip.

There is a district Hospital just 2min walk from the airstrip at phaplu. 3hrs walk North of salleri on the Hill Slope lies a Monastery Of Chewong Gompa. 2.5hrs south down hill lies the Precious Salleri Chalsa Electric Hydropower Power house. 2days walk to the North from Salleri comes a breathtaking beautiful DudhKunda meaning (Milky Lake) just below the gorgeous and Holy Mt. Numbur, Mt.Karyalung. 1.5days walk west lies a Pike Hill (4056m). One can witness a wonderful and Majestic view of the Himalayan Range from Kanchanjunga in the east to Dhaulagiri in the west along with lovely 
sun rise n sunset. 3hrs walk up the hill from phaplu to Ratnange hill a place one can witness the majestic himalayas along with everest.
Visit Chewang monastery

Shop at the local market
One can buy many locally made handicraft.Clothes made from wild Stingingnettle 
(Allo product), Nepali paper note books, carpet made from wool of mountain sheep (Raadi) , other wollen tibetan style carpet too.
There are nemorous Hotel and Lodges for accomodation. Everest Hotel and Shangrila Hotel  in Phaplu is the Best place for accomodation and Fooding.
Local Rakchi, local beer (chhang) , Tongba. Other Foreighn brand too.
